channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: Empirical knowledge is life I am a social anthropologist finishing a PhD in computer science. The best I have found in computer science is the method for computing honest beliefs that guarantee intersubjective agreements (known as Bayesian inference), its isomorphism with evolutionary theory, and the real advantage that cooperation has in both systems. This argument is not only theoretical, it is pragmatic: its breakdown has consequences even for those who seek individual advantage.
